sentence.Network_en: Straightway the jollity broke loose again with the reading of the names.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个个人名念下去,肆无忌惮的哄笑声又响了起来.

sentence.Network_en: Yet in the midst of all the jollity, he felt a little forlorn.
sentence.Network_cn: 可是,在这个热闹的局面中, 他也感觉到一点凄凉难过.

sentence.Network_en: Oh, my dear, I trembled at the prospect of his jollity.
sentence.Network_cn: 啊, 我亲爱的, 我倒担心是否能指望他欢喜.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以j开头的英语英文单词 ... joist 托梁,桁 jollity 快乐，欢乐 jolt 颠簸，震摇.
英语二级口笔译大纲疑难词汇 - 豆丁网 ... jokey adj. 好开玩笑的, 滑稽的 jollity n. 高兴, 酒宴 jolty adj. 摇动的, 颠簸的.
愿你们在欢闹(jollity)中这么做, 啊欢闹! 我几乎学会这个器皿的语言了!我们很欢喜与你们谈话, 感谢你们的呼求. 我们祝福每一位, 我.

jupiter - the bringer of jollity ., 木星 - 快乐之神.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French jolite, from joli (see jolly)

example.ex: ...the singing and jollity of the celebration.

means.word_mean: 1. feeling jolly and jovial and full of good humor

auth_sentence.content: He dreamed of...a life of untrammelled joy and jollity.

auth_sentence.content: She sang...music-hall songs...defused of all jollity.

auth_sentence.content: The genial festival of Christmas, which...lights up the...home with mirth and jollity.
